content.rendered:
Directed by Franklin Jacob

Written by Franklin Jacob. Santhosh Narayanan. Abdullah Raaj

Star Dilipan. Iniya. Al Hasan Milad. Samuthirakani

Language Tamil

Producers Aditi Anand. Aditi Anand. Saurabh Gupta . Pa. Ranjith. Abhayanand Singh. Piiyush Singh. Avinash Viswanathan

Production Neelam Productions
